static Provider * GetGlobalProvider (INT columnid)

Detailed Description

MainProvider provides an application with all providers registered in the system. These registered providers can be shared between all applications.

BOOLEAN MainProvider::AcquireGlobalProvider (  INT  providerid  )  [static]
 

Register access to the global provider list before using a certain provider. Therefore a certain application can not remove it from the list
